title: Gazebo PERFORMANCE_transport_stress test fails but build marked as success

content.raw:
On the [gazebo-performance-default-xenial-amd64](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-performance-default-xenial-amd64/39) build, the `PERFORMANCE_transport_stress` fails to run and times out after 240 seconds. Here's the [console output](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-performance-default-xenial-amd64/39/console):

~~~
327: [ RUN      ] TransportStressTest.LocalPublish
11/14 Test #327: PERFORMANCE_transport_stress .............***Timeout 240.03 sec
~~~

I can confirm this test failure on my local machine and will report it to gazebo, but the build should not be marked as a success, since this test failed.
content.html:
On the gazebo-performance-default-xenial-amd64 build, the PERFORMANCE_transport_stress fails to run and times out after 240 seconds. Here's the console output:

327: [ RUN      ] TransportStressTest.LocalPublish
11/14 Test #327: PERFORMANCE_transport_stress .............***Timeout 240.03 sec

I can confirm this test failure on my local machine and will report it to gazebo, but the build should not be marked as a success, since this test failed.
